SEARCH
Package project.education.controller

Class CourseController

java.lang.Object
project.education.controller.CourseController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/course") public class CourseController extends Object
Controller for handling requests related to courses. Provides functionality to manage courses, teachers, students, and tasks.

      courseService - service for managing courses
      teacherService - service for managing teachers
      taskService - service for managing tasks
      studentService - service for managing students

  • Method Details

    • getCoursePage

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public String getCoursePage(@PathVariable Long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Retrieves the course page for a specific course.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the course
      model - the model to populate with course and student data
      Returns:
      the view name for the course page

    • addCourse

      @PostMapping("/add") public String addCourse(@RequestParam String title, @RequestParam Long teacherId)
      Adds a new course to the system.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the course
      teacherId - the ID of the teacher assigned to the course
      Returns:
      a redirect to the teacher page

    • deleteCourse

      @PostMapping("/{courseId}/delete") public String deleteCourse(@PathVariable Long courseId, @RequestParam Long teacherId)
      Deletes a specific course.
      Parameters:
      courseId - the ID of the course to delete
      teacherId - the ID of the teacher associated with the course
      Returns:
      a redirect to the teacher page for the given teacher

    • getStudentCoursePage

      @GetMapping("/student/{courseId}") public String getStudentCoursePage(@PathVariable Long courseId, @RequestParam Long studentId, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Retrieves the course page for a specific student.
      Parameters:
      courseId - the ID of the course
      studentId - the ID of the student
      model - the model to populate with course, task, and student data
      Returns:
      the view name for the student course page

    • getTeacherCoursePage

      @GetMapping("/teacher/{courseId}") public String getTeacherCoursePage(@PathVariable Long courseId, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Retrieves the course page for a specific teacher.
      Parameters:
      courseId - the ID of the course
      model - the model to populate with course, student, and task data
      Returns:
      the view name for the teacher course page
